Lang.desc: Enables classes to contain text that can be localized to specific languages.

Class.Refactor.desc: Allows for a class to extend itself without damaging it's namespace.

Array.Extras.desc: Extends the Array native object to include useful methods to work with arrays.

Date.desc: Extends the Date native object to include methods useful in managing dates.

Date.Extras.desc: Extends the Date native object to include extra methods (on top of those in Date.js).

Hash.Extras.desc: Extends the Hash native object to include getFromPath which allows a path notation to child elements.

String.Extras.desc: Extends the String native object to include methods useful in managing strings (query strings, urls, etc).

URI.desc: Provides methods useful in managing the window location and uris.

URI.Relative.desc: Extends the URI class to add methods for computing relative and absolute urls.

Element.Measure.desc: Extends the Element native object to include methods useful in measuring dimensions.

Element.Position.desc: Extends the Element native object to include methods useful positioning elements relative to others.

Fx.Elements.desc: Effect to change any number of CSS properties of any number of Elements.

Fx.Accordion.desc: An Fx.Elements extension which allows you to easily create accordion type controls.

Fx.Move.desc: Moves an element to another location (relative to another element) with a transition.

Fx.Reveal.desc: Executes a transition from display:block to display:none and vice versa.

Fx.Scroll.desc: Effect to smoothly scroll any element, including the window.

Fx.Slide.desc: Effect to slide an element in and out of view.

Fx.Sort.desc: Reorders a group of items with a transition.

Drag.desc: The base Drag Class. Can be used to drag and resize Elements using mouse events.

Drag.Move.desc: A Drag extension that provides support for the constraining of draggables to containers and droppables.

Slider.desc: Class for creating horizontal and vertical slider controls.

Sortables.desc: Class for creating a drag and drop sorting interface for lists of items.

Assets.desc: Provides methods to dynamically load JavaScript, CSS, and Image files into the document.

Color.desc: Class for creating and manipulating colors in JavaScript. Supports HSB -> RGB Conversions and vice versa.

Group.desc: Class for monitoring collections of events.

Hash.Cookie.desc: Class for creating, reading, and deleting browser Cookies in JSON format.

IframeShim.desc: Creates a transparent iframe to mask out items not drawn by the browser (flash, select lists, etc) for IE6.

Date.English.US.desc: Date messages in English (with conventions for the US).
